response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This price reflects the significant savings compared to the market value of $12,000, while still allowing me to recoup a fair portion of its cost. I look forward to hearing your response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 11500}
